###5.3
Setting Up a Performance Experiment
Start by selecting a task from the Perf menu in the Debugger Main View. Tasks are predefined experiment setups. "Determine bottlenecks, identify phases" is useful when you are testing a program for the first time.
From the Perf menu choose "Select Task" "Determine Bottlenecks, identify phases".






Select Task
Examine Results...
Configs...

Determine bottlenecks,identify phases
Get Total Time per function & source line
Get CPU Time per function & source line
Get Ideal Time(pixie) per function & source line
Trace I/O activity
Trace system calls
Trace page faults
Find memory leaks
Find Floating Point Exceptions
Get PC Sampling Times
Custom task
